alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Logan; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN LOGAN, CENTRAL AUGLAIZE AND WESTERN HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Waynesfield, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Wapakoneta, Ada, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, Cridersville, Anna, Jackson Center, Russells Point, Botkins, Lakeview, New Knoxville, Alger, Waynesfield, Chippewa Park, Roundhead, Mcguffey, Uniopolis, Kettlersville and Dola. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 99 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
